task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 341°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will first look up to find the roof.
I can now see the top of the building; by counting the floors, which appear to be about 6, and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, I can estimate the total height.
